name: Classic Cappuccino
desc: A timeless mix of espresso, steamed milk, and a thick layer of foam.

name: Iced Cappuccino
desc: Chilled espresso blended with milk and foam, refreshing and smooth.

name: Mocha Cappuccino
desc: A cappuccino twist with rich chocolate flavor for mocha lovers.

name: Vanilla Cappuccino
desc: Sweet vanilla infused with bold espresso and creamy milk foam.

name: Classic Americano
desc: Espresso diluted with hot water for a smooth, rich flavor.

name: Iced Americano
desc: Espresso over ice, bold and refreshing for hot days.

name: White Americano
desc: A smoother version of Americano with a splash of milk.

name: Caramel Americano
desc: Americano infused with sweet caramel syrup for a tasty kick.

name: Classic Iced Coffee
desc: Bold brewed coffee poured over ice for instant refreshment.

name: Vanilla Iced Coffee
desc: Iced coffee with a smooth vanilla twist, light and sweet.

name: Mocha Iced Coffee
desc: Refreshing iced coffee with rich mocha chocolate blend.

name: Caramel Iced Coffee
desc: Cool iced coffee drizzled with caramel syrup.

name: Iced Cold Brew
desc: Slow-steeped coffee for smooth, less acidic flavor.

name: Iced Latte
desc: Chilled espresso mixed with milk for creamy refreshment.

name: Single Shot Espresso
desc: A strong single shot of espresso, pure coffee essence.

name: Double Shot Espresso
desc: Double the espresso for double the energy.

name: Ristretto
desc: A shorter, more concentrated espresso shot with bold flavor.

name: Lungo
desc: An espresso shot pulled longer with more water.

name: Classic Mocha
desc: Espresso and hot chocolate topped with whipped cream.

name: White Chocolate Mocha
desc: Smooth mocha blended with sweet white chocolate.

name: Caramel Mocha
desc: Mocha infused with caramel for rich sweetness.

name: Iced Mocha
desc: Chilled mocha blend, creamy and refreshing.

name: Classic Latte
desc: Espresso mixed with steamed milk and light foam.

name: Vanilla Latte
desc: Latte with added vanilla sweetness.

name: Caramel Latte
desc: Classic latte enhanced with caramel flavor.

name: Hazelnut Latte
desc: Nutty hazelnut flavor blended into a creamy latte.
